"""
api.py.txt


"""

from django.conf.urls import url, include
from django.db import models
from rest_framework.renderers import JSONRenderer
from rest_framework.routers import DefaultRouter
from rest_framework.serializers import ModelSerializer
from rest_framework.viewsets import ModelViewSet



class {model_name}(models.Model):
    """Automatically Generated Django Model Class named {model_name}"""


    class Meta:
        db_table = {model_name_lcase}
        app_label = 'django_gpslogger'


class {model_name}Serializer(ModelSerializer):
    """{model_name} Serializer"""
    class Meta:
        model = {model_name}
        fields = '__all__'


class {model_name}ViewSet(ModelViewSet):
    model = {model_name}
    renderer_classes = (JSONRenderer, )
    serializer_class = {model_name}Serializer
    queryset = {model_name}.objects.all()


router = DefaultRouter()
router.register(r'{model_name_lcase}', {model_name}ViewSet)

urlpatterns = [
    url(r'^', include(router.urls))

]
